BT.interfaces

Interface DrawingClicks

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CDBottomRightController, CDMainContentController, MainContentController, PNMainContentController, PNMainContentInitializer, PNMainContentModel, UCMainContentController, UCMainContentModel

    public interface DrawingClicks
    Interface for clicks on drawing pane.
    Author:
    Karel Hala

        Method for handling dragging on pane. Send mouse event and object that is being dragged is any.
        Parameters:

        dragged - object that is being dragged on pane if is any.
